text: And when Abraham said, "O my Lord ! show me how You give life to the dead." He (God) said, "What ! do you not believe?" (Abraham) said, "Why not, but for the satisfaction of my heart." (God) said, "Then take four of the birds, and tame them (to come) towards you, then place on every mountain a part of them, then call them, they will come to you swiftly, and know that God is Mighty, Wise
